products.name: Fresh Organic Apples
products.description: Crisp and sweet organic apples, locally sourced from Pacific Northwest orchards. Perfect for snacking or baking.

products.name: Wild Alaskan Salmon
products.description: Fresh wild-caught Alaskan salmon, rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Never farmed, always sustainable.

products.name: Artisan Sourdough Bread
products.description: Handcrafted sourdough bread with a perfect crust and tangy flavor. Made fresh daily in our bakery.

products.name: Organic Free-Range Eggs
products.description: Farm-fresh eggs from free-range hens. Rich, golden yolks and superior taste.

products.name: Local Honey
products.description: Pure, raw honey from local beekeepers. Perfect natural sweetener with health benefits.

products.name: Grass-Fed Beef Ribeye
products.description: Premium grass-fed ribeye steak, perfectly marbled for exceptional flavor.

products.name: Organic Spinach
products.description: Fresh organic baby spinach, perfect for salads or cooking. Packed with nutrients.

products.name: Craft IPA Beer (6-pack)
products.description: Local craft IPA with citrus notes and a hoppy finish. Must be 21+ to purchase.

products.name: Greek Yogurt
products.description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt, high in protein. Plain, unsweetened variety.

products.name: Dungeness Crab
products.description: Fresh local Dungeness crab, sweet and delicate. A Pacific Northwest favorite.

products.name: Organic Blueberries
products.description: Sweet and juicy organic blueberries. Perfect for snacking or baking.

products.name: Washington Red Wine
products.description: Premium Washington State Cabernet Sauvignon. Full-bodied with notes of black cherry.
